newsitem.title: USA: First Washington files for $175 mln shelf.
newsitem.headline: First Washington files for $175 mln shelf.

text.p: First Washington Realty Trust Inc filed Wednesday a shelf registration with the Securities and Exchange Commission to sell up to $175 million in debt securities, warrants, common and preferred stock.
Net proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, the company said.

First Washington, based in Bethesda, Md., is a fully integrated, self-administered and self-managed real estate company with expertise in the acquisition, management, renovation and development of principally supermarket-anchored neighborhood shopping centers.
